Methods

Public Instance methods

clean_old_versions( versions_to_keep )

If the model instance has more versions than the limit specified, delete all excess older versions.

[Source]

     # File lib/simply_versioned.rb, line 170
170:         def clean_old_versions( versions_to_keep )
171:           find( :all, :conditions => [ 'number <= ?', self.maximum( :number ) - versions_to_keep ] ).each do |version|
172:             version.destroy
173:           end
174:         end

next_version( number )

Return the Version for this model with the next higher version

[Source]

     # File lib/simply_versioned.rb, line 178
178:         def next_version( number )
179:           find( :first, :order => 'number ASC', :conditions => [ "number > ?", number ] )
